Package com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.rhnpackage.ssm

Class Summary
SchedulePackageInstallationAction SSM action that handles prompting the user for when to install the package as well as creating the action when the user confirms the creation.
SchedulePackageRemoveAction Handles the display and capture of scheduling package removals for systems in the SSM.
SchedulePackageUpgradeAction  
SchedulePackageVerifyAction Handles the display and capturing of scheduling package verifications for systems in the SSM.
SelectInstallationPackagesAction SSM action for selecting the packages to install.
SelectRemovePackagesAction Handles listing and selecting a number of packages to remove from systems in the SSM.
SelectUpgradePackagesAction  
SelectVerifyPackagesAction Handles the listing of packages on systems in the SSM that can be verified.
